verb.description: Have (a course of action) as one's purpose or objective; plan.
examples: the company intends to cut about 4,500 jobs
it is intended that coverage shall be worldwide

verb.description: Design or destine (someone or something) for a particular purpose or end.
examples: a one-room cottage intended to accommodate a family

origin: Middle English entend (in the sense direct the attention to), from Old French entendre, from Latin intendere intend, extend, direct, from in- towards + tendere stretch, tend.
